item.title: REGISTER - Android Login And Register - PART 1
item.description: Hello, Assalamu’alaikum.. This is a tutorial making Android applications Login & Register with PHP and MySQL databases. Video Tutorial Setting up Download the file for the server here https://bit.ly/2w6zoXv then, - Import database to local / online server. Copy / Cut the php code into the htdocs directory (if using xampp). Change the configuration of connect.php, adjust the settings for your phpmyadmin example: $conn = mysqli_connect ('localhost', 'username', 'your_password', 'database_name');
